topic.title: official torbrowser bundle
topic.body:
The official torbrowser bundle - I am using debian/linux -
does not have the fields for setting up the manual proxy 
for using zeronet.sh with it
How can I setup zeronet in this official torbrowser?
https://dist.torproject.org/torbrowser/9.5.4/tor-browser-linux64-9.5.4_en-US.tar.xz
:(
